messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I believe in Southend & Rochford and want us to thrive. We need local people to be given priority for housing; affordable energy; free parking at hospitals. UKIP will fight for all these. I want libraries properly staffed, care homes kept open and a flood risk assessment of the entire seafront. I've lived and worked here for more than 40 years. It is time that you were represented by an MP who is from here and who is prepared to send a message to Westminster that we need change. I've had enough, have you?

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Priority for Local People in Housing
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Giving priority to local people for housing.
UKIP will fight for free parking at hospitals.
I want libraries properly staffed and care homes kept open.
Conducting a flood risk assessment of the entire seafront.

mentions.candidate: I've lived and worked here for more than 40 years. It is time that you were represented by an MP who is from here and who is prepared to send a message to Westminster that we need change.

housing.content: We need local people to be given priority for housing
